:orphan:

Examples Gallery
================

This gallery contains examples demonstrating the features and capabilities of dartwork-mpl.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Basic Plots
===========

Fundamental plotting examples demonstrating core dartwork-mpl features.
These examples show basic line plots, scatter plots, and essential styling techniques.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Basic usage with style presets.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_basic_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_basic.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Basic Usage</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Filled area plots and combinations with lines.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_area_plots_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_area_plots.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Area Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Demonstrating multiple line plots with different colors and styles.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_multiple_lines_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_multiple_lines.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Multiple Line Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Various marker styles and combinations with lines.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_markers_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_markers.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Marker Styles</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Different line styles and dash patterns for data visualization.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_line_styles_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_line_styles.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Line Styles</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Scatter plots with varying markers, color encodings, and density overlays to compare clustering patterns.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_scatter_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_scatter.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Scatter Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Advanced line plot styles, banded intervals, and rolling smoothing for publication-ready comparisons.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/01_basic_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_line_advanced_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_01_basic_plots_plot_line_advanced.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Advanced Line Plots</div>
    </div>


.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Statistical Plots
=================

Statistical visualization examples including histograms, distributions, error bars,
and probability density functions for data analysis and scientific research.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Probability density functions.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_probability_density_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_probability_density.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Probability Density</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Violin and box plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_violin_box_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_violin_box.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Violin and Box Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Correlation matrix visualization and scatter plot matrices.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_correlation_matrix_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_correlation_matrix.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Correlation Matrix</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Linear and polynomial regression visualization with confidence intervals.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_regression_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_regression.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Regression Analysis</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Error bars and confidence intervals in multiple orientations and scales.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_errorbars_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_errorbars.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Error Bars</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="KDE plots for probability density estimation and comparison.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_kde_plots_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_kde_plots.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Kernel Density Estimation</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Various probability distribution visualizations.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_distribution_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_distribution.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Probability Distributions</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Histograms and density plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_histogram_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_histogram.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Histograms</div>
    </div>


.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Bar Charts
==========

Various bar chart styles including grouped, stacked, horizontal, and waterfall charts
for categorical data visualization and comparisons.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Basic and grouped bar charts.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_bar_chart_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_bar_chart.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Bar Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Horizontal bar chart variations for categorical data.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_horizontal_bar_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_horizontal_bar.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Horizontal Bar Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Diverging bar charts for showing positive and negative values.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_diverging_bar_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_diverging_bar.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Diverging Bar Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Lollipop charts as an alternative to bar charts.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_lollipop_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_lollipop.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Lollipop Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Waterfall charts for showing cumulative effects of sequential values.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_waterfall_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_waterfall.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Waterfall Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Stacked bar charts in vertical, horizontal, percentage, and cumulative views.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_stacked_bar_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_stacked_bar.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Stacked Bar Chart</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Grouped bar charts.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/03_bar_charts/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_grouped_bar_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_03_bar_charts_plot_grouped_bar.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Grouped Bar Chart</div>
    </div>


.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Scientific Plots
================

Advanced scientific visualizations including contour plots, heatmaps, vector fields,
and publication-quality figures for academic research.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Streamplots for vector fields.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_streamplot_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_streamplot.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Streamplot</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Contour plots with labels.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_contour_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_contour.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Contour Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Heatmap visualization.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_heatmap_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_heatmap.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Heatmap</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Publication-quality scientific figure.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_scientific_paper_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_scientific_paper.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Scientific Paper Figure</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Vector field visualizations with streamlines and contours.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_vector_field_advanced_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_vector_field_advanced.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Advanced Vector Fields</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Frequency domain analysis and spectral plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_spectral_analysis_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_spectral_analysis.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Spectral Analysis</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Three-dimensional surface visualizations for scientific data.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_3d_surface_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_3d_surface.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">3D Surface Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Quiver plots for vector fields: circular, radial, and spiraling flows.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_quiver_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_quiver.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Quiver Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Phase space and trajectory plots for dynamical systems.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/04_scientific_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_phase_diagram_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_04_scientific_plots_plot_phase_diagram.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Phase Diagrams</div>
    </div>


.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Time Series
===========

Time-based data visualization examples including datetime plots, forecasts,
seasonal decomposition, and financial charts.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Moving averages and rolling window statistics.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_rolling_stats_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_rolling_stats.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Rolling Statistics</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="ACF and PACF plots for time series analysis.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_autocorrelation_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_autocorrelation.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Autocorrelation Analysis</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Comparing multiple time series with different visualization techniques.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_time_comparison_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_time_comparison.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Time Series Comparison</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Detecting and visualizing trends in time series data.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_trend_analysis_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_trend_analysis.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Trend Analysis</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Visualizing time series forecasts with confidence intervals.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_forecast_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_forecast.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Time Series Forecasting</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Step plots for change detection, shift timing, and rolling summaries.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_step_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_step.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Step Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Time series plotting with multiple date formats, rolling trends, and spans.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_datetime_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_datetime.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Datetime Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Stem plots for spikes, grouped series, and categorical stems.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_stem_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_stem.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Stem Plots</div>
    </div>


.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Specialized Plots
=================

Specialized visualization types including 3D plots, polar coordinates, radar charts,
pie charts, and other unique plot types for specific use cases.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="3D surface and scatter plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_3d_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_3d.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">3D Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Dual y-axis plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_dual_axis_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_dual_axis.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Dual Axis</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Polar coordinate plots, scatter distributions, and radial bars.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_polar_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_polar.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Polar Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Visualizing distributions across categories with ridgeline plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_ridgeline_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_ridgeline.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Ridgeline Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Radar/spider charts for multivariate data visualization.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_radar_chart_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_radar_chart.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Radar Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Pie charts, donut plots, and nested variants for share comparisons.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_pie_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_pie.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Pie Charts</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Visualizing hierarchical and nested data structures.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_treemap_simple_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_treemap_simple.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Hierarchical Visualization</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Filled area plots: confidence bands, stacked areas, and layered regions.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_filled_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_filled.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Filled Plots</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Visualizing flows and connections between elements.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/06_specialized_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_sankey_simple_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_06_specialized_plots_plot_sankey_simple.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Flow Diagrams</div>
    </div>


.. thumbnail-parent-div-close

.. raw:: html

    </div>

Layout & Styling
================

Layout optimization, subplot arrangement, legend customization, annotations,
and advanced styling techniques for publication-quality figures.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Subplots with shared x or y axes for comparison.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/07_layout_styling/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_shared_axes_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_07_layout_styling_plot_shared_axes.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Shared Axes</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Layout optimization techniques.">

.. only:: html

    </div>

Colors & Images
===============

Color palette demonstrations, custom colormaps, color cycles, and image display
techniques showcasing dartwork-mpl's color system.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Color palette visualization.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/08_colors_images/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_colors_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_08_colors_images_plot_colors.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Colors</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Using and customizing color cycles for multi-series plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/08_colors_images/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_color_cycles_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_08_colors_images_plot_color_cycles.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Color Cycles</div>
    </div>

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Choosing appropriate color schemes for different data types.">

    :alt:

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Diverging and Sequential Colors</div>
